TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MethodResponse extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class MethodResponse Implements IMethodReturnMessage, ISerializable
type MethodResponse = class interface IMethodReturnMessage interface ISerializable interface IMethodMessage interface IMessage

summary.span: 實作 介面，以建立做為遠端物件上之方法回應的訊息。

span.span: Implements the interface to create a message that acts as a method response on a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A產生遠端物件上呼叫方法的結果，以及用來傳回至呼叫端的方法呼叫的結果。A is generated as a result of a method called on a remote object, and is used to return the results of the method call back to the caller. 此訊息包含傳回值和`out`引數。The message includes a return value and `out` arguments. 類別由.NET framework 遠端基礎結構。The class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework. 您不需要建立的執行個體直接類別; 相反地，使用介面。You do not need to create an instance of the class directly; instead, use the interface. 包含遠端資料的訊息接收的結尾。 contains remoting data at the end of the message sink. 遠端伺服器傳回訊息給用戶端。A remoting server returns a message to a client.
